package.description: v4l camera driver, based on the luvcview package. This package detects the supported controls of your USB camera and generates a dynamic reconfigure interface. The control parameters like brightness, ... can be saved and loaded during runtime via the dynamic reconfigure interface. Tested are the Logitech 9000pro and Logitech sphere. Even the focus/pan tilt can be controlled via the dynamic reconfigure interface.
package.author: Markus Bader
